Text:
Okay, on the good side, the video quality is impeccable. Unfortunately, that is the only good thing I can comment on this .torrent. The screen resolution seems a bit off (720*552). However, what is worse is that entire chunks of the movie is removed.

The DVD release is 1:26:14. This version is only 1:11:10. The entire opening credits sequence is removed. Within the first six minutes of the original DVD release, only 90 seconds is shown on this release. I would definitely find a better version.
